name: Break loop
description:
操作:鼠标左键点击虚线框旋转.

简介:三角形会在路径内一直循环移动,直到进入了白色圆内.

参加的game jam:UOC Game Jam 2022.

game jam主题是: Stuck in a Loop.

关卡没做完.没法保持精神专注.

版权:

字体:狼人小林

音乐:lowenergygirl

------

Operation: Left-click the dotted frame to rotate.

Introduction: The triangle will continue to circulate in the path until it enters the white circle.

Participated in game jam: UOC Game Jam 2022.

The theme of the game jam is: Stuck in a Loop.

The level is not finished. I can't keep my mind focused.

Credits:

Font: 狼人小林

Music: lowenergygirl
